Package coupon.sys.core.main

Class CouponSystem

  • java.lang.Object
    • coupon.sys.core.main.CouponSystem

  • public class CouponSystem
extends Object
    This is the singleton pattern coupon system of the project, that returns the right facade object if the login attempt is successful. And by that the user can check or make actions in the program. Also starts the Daily timer task thread for deleting unnecessary coupons. And is able to shut down the system.
    Version:
    1.0 September 18, 2018.
    Author:
    Julio Hernan Trajtemberg
